items.sentence: You should thank your lucky stars that you didn't get injured any worse than you did.
Tom hadn't done the washing-up for a week, meaning the sink was full of dirty dishes.
Tom left a window open during the storm and now almost everything in the room is wet.
Admittedly, your plan makes sense, but I still think it'll be very hard to carry out.
I hope that you know the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.
